answers.answer: In some cases, it absolutely can be controlled by watching your diet- making sure to eat those things that are not just 'healthy' but watching the carb intake in those things too.  There are some cases that you will need the medications for- but regardless, healthy eating habits can only improve your condition.
Healthy eating generally means eating low carb, avoiding processed foods, when it comes to diabetes management and prevention.

question: The old saying "you are what you eat". So a healthy way of eating. A Lifelong way of eating.
title: Can type 2 diabetes be control by a heather long term way of eating?
